website_summaries.verdict: Some people prefer the taste and potency of other brands, but this is the best overall energy drink on the planet.
pros: It's remained popular for a reason — Red Bull is still the best energy drink out there
It's a bit more expensive than many competitors, but tastes great and works very well
cons: Tastes good — consuming too much can be a problem at 110 calories each
Also, people mix this with alcohol and that can be a dangerous combo

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I’m not happy with this at all. I love the product but someone who packed my order decided they wanted one too. They thought it was ok to steal one out of mine. So beware you might get your product missing one.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: All banged up
customer_reviews.text: These cans arrived dented up. They were a sticky mess where one had exploded all over them. Three were so badly dented that they had gone completely flat and were undrinkable. I use subscribe and save to have six cases of red bull delivered to my door every month. I like subscribe and save for the convenience and good price. It's not worth it if the product arrives undrinkable. I used to recommend subscribe and save delivery of this product to anyone I saw drinking Redbull. I would not do that any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie's mom

customer_reviews.title: 2 of the RedBull cans has a hole
customer_reviews.text: I don't know where I can send or post pics and video. I received the redbull package around 8:45PM tonight. I did not open the package till around 11:20PM, oh my gosh, 2 of the cans has holes. Once, I pick up the redbull blue box (not the shipping box) it was leaking and dripping everywhere on my kitchen table. I was going to offer the redbull to my friend and end up with a mess. i'm speechless.
customer_reviews.author: DJoni SoFian

customer_reviews.title: Best of tasting of the Red Bull flavors.
customer_reviews.text: My wife brought me home a four pack of these one day a few months back. I was never a energy drink person but I was getting tired of drinking coffee all the time and wanted to change things up. It’s definitely the best tasting of the Red Bull’s. I plan to buy it again when this case runs out being that I don’t drink them every day, Only on days when I feel that I need a little something extra. And the cost isn’t too bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Shaneomac35

customer_reviews.title: Best Energy Drink Ever, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: I'm addicted to Redbull so the option to order a case online with 2 day shipping is a God send!! Honestly it's not even the caffeine, it's the taste that I truly enjoy! If they ever decide to make my dreams come true and create a caffeine free original flavor redbull drink I would be in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Cassy

customer_reviews.title: I keep this stuff stocked at all times.
customer_reviews.text: The best of the Red Bull flavors if you ask me. Way better than the original which doesn't taste good at all. I don't know if I'd say this is really cranberry, it's not very tart and has more of a mixed fruit drink (but not a super sugary punch flavor). I drink this by itself rather than as a mixer. I have a 7 month old that isn't a good sleeper. So I basically live on this stuff, sometimes drinking a can before I can make coffee. Best idea ever? No. But it helps.
customer_reviews.author: F. Carter

customer_reviews.title: A Wonderful Value & Fast Shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Red Bull! :) This is one reason I buy it from Amazon Prime. It's cheaper than buying it in a store, and I definitely go through a lot of these drinks, per day! Lol. Again, the price is awesome, drinks are amazing, and packaging is good! However, I have had a couple of cases arrive, with some of the cans bent on the end of on the top, making them difficult to open/drink, or to sit down on a surface. Also, the packages are sometimes, torn open on one end, from shipping and handling, I assume. Shipping is usually very fast, too!! 14/15 Stars!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Leah Leedy

customer_reviews.title: The cans were good only some had dents but no leaks the box ...
customer_reviews.text: The cans were good only some had dents but no leaks the box was kinda open though that's why I put 4 stars This is the second time I order it and this time it came late and the box was literally ripped and crushed when I opened the box the red bull box was open and some cans were dented bad but no leaks seriously if you guys are going to make a slap ass job like this I rather buy some at the store I could think of so many ways to keep the box tight for the whole ride instead of just putting a plastic on top
customer_reviews.author: chuyster

customer_reviews.title: Great when they're a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Love this flavor and when this first showed up on Amazon it was $15/case. So like a normal person I bought a few cases. I regret not buying more because the price is now 4x higher. So was a great deal and an amazing product, but I wouldn't buy it again until it goes down to a more reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Badamo

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Came with other products in a bigger box but the red bull box was open and the cans were crushing my other items!
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with red Bull
customer_reviews.text: I love my Red Bull. Instead of paying $7 for a drink at a nearby coffee shop I started using red bulls to make my own version of their drink for 1/4 of their price. 1 can of Red Bull 24 oz cup filled with ice 4 scoops of torani flavor of your choice! (more or less depending on person) and blend! Or iced is good too!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional, If the price were stable!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT drink. Does a good job of filling the void left by the missing No Fear Original Energy Drink, but in 10 days the price of this RB Cranberry jumped from $51 delivered, which was a bit too high at that price, to $62 delivered(Prime). I judge it not worth it at this higher price. I'll do without!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Frank

customer_reviews.title: The best flavor!!
customer_reviews.text: I blame my bf for getting me addicted to these. Arrived fast and the flavor was not flat or compromised from shipping. Saves me from the weird looks checkers give me when I buy 12 at a time for work. Delicious and definitely subscribed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best taste, and company true to its values
customer_reviews.text: I love Red Bull, it got me trough many sleepless nights of driving in the city. And last but not the least I fully support a company whose CEO is not a coward and is able to act on what he believes in instead of virtue signalling. Go Red Bull!
customer_reviews.author: Red Piller

customer_reviews.title: Missing part of the order. ????
customer_reviews.text: Just received my reoccurring order of Red Bull and it is obvious that the original shipping box came open and one of the Red Bull boxes opened and half of the cans disappeared. So in other words one box of 12 cans of Red Bull was fine and one box was opened and only six of the cans were in the bottom of the resealed shipping box
customer_reviews.author: Connie Lahrim

customer_reviews.title: Red Bull for the Win
customer_reviews.text: It's Red Bull. It gives you wings. It's 10% off if you get it at the right time. It's subscribe and save. That makes it way less than the store, and this tangerine is a great flavor you don't see much. Get some!
customer_reviews.author: Daggwood

customer_reviews.title: It's RedBull
customer_reviews.text: The reason for my overall low scoring is because several cans are WRECKED, just a mess and the last time I ordered it, I didn't have an issue. The shipping was fast and these don't expire for a year and a half which is great, but the condition of some of the cans is just horrendous!
customer_reviews.author: Orlene

customer_reviews.title: Good..  But $3 a can??
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, not as sugary as soda but plenty sweet. Not as acidic as soda. Packs a quality punch. Entirely too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Caffeine junky
customer_reviews.text: I normally order monster energy drinks but i always have 2 or 3 cans beat up from shipping. the cases for red bull didn't come beat up surprisingly. I highly recommend this product if your a caffeine junky like myself. These go great if you mix with boba (fruit flavor).
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: 4th consistent purchase
customer_reviews.text: You're getting the big cans for under $2 per which is way better than the small can prices at any store. Can be bought with EBT, since it has Nutritional Facts instead of Supplemental. See video for unboxing.
customer_reviews.author: Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Tastes off
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the normal taste of a Red Bull, but they were definitely not the same as usual. I didn’t finish the pack :(
customer_reviews.author: Anna Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Not the strongest energy drink or best tasting
customer_reviews.text: Not the strongest energy drink or best tasting, but just what I need when I'm done with coffee for the day.
customer_reviews.author: ~Just a guy~

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Love Red Bull but last 2 shipments and had exploded cans which wet the whole shipment
customer_reviews.author: Inez Vazquez Elias

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Good price, obviously a great product, but very disappointed in the packaging it was delivered in. Box was ripped apart and cans were placed with the wrong orientation to one another.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Bickel

customer_reviews.title: While I love your original flavor
customer_reviews.text: Dear Red Bull, While I love your original flavor, I feel like you've achieved something truly great with Red Bull Red Edition. I can only hope that this is a permanent offering. Let's be honest, your other edition flavors are merely average and aren't even up to the same level of flavor/taste in that of the Original Red Bull, but this... this is greatness. I'll be happy if you made Red Edition the new standard flavor. It's delightful. Thank you. Sincerely, Dave
customer_reviews.author: AmznDave

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SAUCE!  100% Happy!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say.....it does give me wings. I don't drink coffee, so one can of this snaps me out of the morning fog right away. I can't live with out now, lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best RedBull....Best Beverage out there
customer_reviews.text: I love Orange RedBull. Target stopped carrying it and the big chain grocery store charges $8.99 for a 4pack. Amazon saved the day with the same price target sold 4 packs (you do have to buy 24cans though but it still the same price per can).
customer_reviews.author: J. Spatta

customer_reviews.title: Really needs better secondary packaging
customer_reviews.text: The box was in shambles and the cans were dented like crazy. Luckily the cans are super strong or anything else would have burst. The product's likely fine on the inside, but the cans look like they've gone through a heavyweight fight. Probably not a good idea to send in this count.
customer_reviews.author: J. Liang

customer_reviews.title: notgood
customer_reviews.text: I bought Red Bull with coconut and orange flavors. I found that the shelf life of Red Bull with these flavors is only 3 to 4 months. I think I will only buy the original Red Bull next time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Learn how to securely pack an item
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Packing leaves a lot to be desired. Box of cans in a bigger box. Three little bubbles in the box. Box of cans broke open and went everywhere in bigger box. Several cans dented and no longer stand up, so you can't put it down till your drink is gone. Really packers learn to secure the product. This is the second time out of three orders.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: I ordered an extra amount, 2 cases. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an extra amount, 2 cases. It is February, thee expire in JUNE! This is not fresh rooted product!
customer_reviews.author: jimss

customer_reviews.title: Auto-ship is great for a Bull lover and economical too.
customer_reviews.text: Easier to have it auto-shipped if you have someone who drinks a can a day. Equivalent to sale prices at the drugstore. Don’t have to continually buy and lug around heavy cans. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Boston K

customer_reviews.title: have been a fan
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Red Bull drink - help me through long night working. Buying on Amazon saves me money than buying in stores (CVS or deli..). All great, I subscribe to monthly delivery to save extra 5%.
customer_reviews.author: Noe_Noe

customer_reviews.title: All cans were smashed and took two weeks to get
customer_reviews.text: All the cans were out of the original box and smashed. Kept saying delivering today for two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo Cali

customer_reviews.title: Bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: Although the product is good, I am extremely disappointed in the shipping quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Packaged and Perfect Price!
customer_reviews.text: The pack came intact with no bumps or missing cans. Perfect! The price is excellent as well as these cans cost $4.00 each at the deli across the street. Overall I am very happy so far and I will keep ordering more as long as the price doesn't increase too much from around the $32.00 that it is right now for the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Tito

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, good value
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this large quantity you probably like the flavor. It's my favorite but I can't find any multi packs anywhere. You either like or dont. Less expensive than buying individual cans.
customer_reviews.author: larisa

customer_reviews.title: WOW, 2 DAY DELIVERY WITH ABSOLUTELY NO PROBLEMS
customer_reviews.text: Wow I'm so excited for my redbull to arrive in excellent condition cause by the other reviews I was so nervous about some either drinking a can of my redbull and leaving me case short one or it getting damaged. NO IT WAS A PERFECT 2 DAY DELIVERY WITH ABSOLUTELY NO PROBLEMS. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND AND THANK YOU AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Usually not a big fan of Red Bull flavors but this flavor is really good! Hard to find a big pac in stores (I’ve found the individual ones at Walmart if you want to try one first before committing to 24)
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: Gives me a boost when needed
customer_reviews.text: I think most know what energy drinks do. Just can't drink a lot of it per day as it will DEhydrate you and can be dangerous. drink water too
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Works well fair price expensive everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I like Redbull like drinking a extra cup of coffee. These are small cans. Expensive but do what they advertise. Would buy again from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jene Pitsenbarger

customer_reviews.title: It’s cranberry Red Bull so...yeah it’s great!
customer_reviews.text: I love and I mean love cranberry Red Bull. I couldn’t find a large package anywhere so I turned to amazon and I’m happy I did. The price is so much better than paying for individual cans or 4 packs. Now I have a constant supply of Red Bull I can’t ask for anything more!
customer_reviews.author: ChaCha

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a pack of 6! But like other reviews the redbull box is so beat up and ripped open then stuffed into a bag/box that was also beat up bad
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: The cost per oz is a fair price
customer_reviews.text: If they arrive in one piece, this is a good deal. I've never had an issue until today but Amazon resolved it rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica.walker

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again!!!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this item/flavor. At my local stores, they are always out of stock. But, I knew I could trust that Amazon would have a seller that I can purchase this item from and at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product/flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love this flavor! Is the perfect size and has just the right amount of caffeine to get you through a long day. I just wish this flavor wasn’t limited edition!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Cranberry Red Bull at Half the Cost
customer_reviews.text: The best flavor that Red Bull offers and you get them for about $1.71 per can. When you purchase them at a convenience store or the grocery store they run you about $2.95 or 2/$5. Great Price if you are drinking 1/day.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dille

customer_reviews.title: Red Bull rules!
customer_reviews.text: Can never go wrong with Red Bull. I like the taste, and the slight thrust of energy. I thinly slice citrus fruits, small amount of organic vinegar and ice cold Red Bull together in a glass; its a great taste while preparing for work. Red Bull never gives me the jitters, its the only energy drink I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Ingraham

customer_reviews.title: My favorite kins
customer_reviews.text: This is the only flavor of Red Bull I like (tart cranberry masks B vitamins taste) so when I saw a lightning deal for <$2/can (which is what it goes on sale at HEB every other month or so) I bought a case. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and unbroken!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on time, I opened the box and was surprised to see that none of the cans were broken or dented. But I’ve read other reviews before buying and I was concerned that cans would be broken because of how inconsistent the reviews were. But none were broken as said, but do purchase cautiously. You’re betting $20 that no cans will explode in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: The best flavor
customer_reviews.text: Tropical flavor Red Bull if my all-time favorite drink the rest out there and everything was wonderful and I really do appreciate it
customer_reviews.author: tylerwhite

customer_reviews.title: Great for a pick me up and a drink mix.
customer_reviews.text: I always get the flavors since they all jump in price, this is one of the better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Brokefool

customer_reviews.title: Decent price when it's not doubled.
customer_reviews.text: Found at a great price but they keep doubling the price again and again. If I'm gonna pay 53 bucks here then I can buy them at half price at the store. Now 37 bucks sure I'll buy them here... now that's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: SECZ

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste of it
customer_reviews.text: Some of the cans had long dings, but when opening them it was fresh and tasted perfectly fine. The price of these red bulls, best I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: I'm J. :)

customer_reviews.title: I have a red bull addiction and it shows
customer_reviews.text: You really can't go wrong with red bull and this is slightly cheaper than the 12 packs at my kroger, so I really couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rittenour

customer_reviews.title: Punctured cans!!
customer_reviews.text: Several cans were punctured during delivery. Any benefit of buying bulk is now voided, because I received less than 24 actual cans of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, Damaged Cans
customer_reviews.text: This case of red bull is a good price. Just don't be surprised if it comes damaged. The cans came all dented and the top lip was bent in like the case had been thrown around in storage or transit.
customer_reviews.author: Psyopsgaming.tv

customer_reviews.title: Best pricing
customer_reviews.text: Was getting these 6 packs on here for 7.29 a piece. That pricing is unheard of, but all good things must come to an end I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy M

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The Box packaging appears to have been opened and definitely wasn’t “handled with care” but cans appear to be fine though probably shaken up quite a bit. Price is fine, nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Schuyler

customer_reviews.title: Gets me started for my nightshift job.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite wake me up right size can to get me started for my night shift job. And the best part...delivered. Right to your door.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Red Bull is the original gold standard energy drink for me! Better price than buying in store separately
customer_reviews.author: Gibb

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad buy
customer_reviews.text: The ease of finding the quantity and having them delivered makes up for the increase in price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Starling

customer_reviews.title: Great product and convenient
customer_reviews.text: arrived early and great value for the money especially seeing I dont have to travel to get them during the COVID-19 time.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Johnson

customer_reviews.title: it does gives you wings...
customer_reviews.text: it does gives you wings...just don't drink 3 on these within an hour or it will give you palpitations
customer_reviews.author: Mezz

customer_reviews.title: NEVER BUYING BANG AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: So I recently found out a portion of Bang energy drinks goes to re-elect trump. (seriously google it) So I guess its Redbull from here on out!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Opened box
customer_reviews.text: My box of Red Bull was open when I received. Not appreciated. The shipping on this merchandise was way too high. Better to go to the store and get myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lee

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: fast delivery came out great not broken up or smashed , thank you amazon
customer_reviews.author: jumbo

customer_reviews.title: good value.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 12 packs. expected to get both at the same time but only received 1.
customer_reviews.author: MSGT Don Inglis

customer_reviews.title: I drank them all.
customer_reviews.text: Taste great. Mood elevated. Energy elevated but not too much. Monsters and Rockstars make me edgy, the "color" edition Red Bull's are just right.
customer_reviews.author: Alex82

customer_reviews.title: Gets me through the day.
customer_reviews.text: Get me through the day - I can't drink coffee, but for some odd reason I can drink this without any adverse affect. Gets me going through the day, only downside is the sugar. Would like to see one without sugar aside for the sugar free aspartame variant.
customer_reviews.author: l!m!t

customer_reviews.title: Open box
customer_reviews.text: Came with the Red Bull box open and when I opened the mailing box, they all fell to the floor. Won’t buy again on here.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: A sticky mess
customer_reviews.text: Some of the cans had somehow exploded which made the whole box a sticky mess. Was not fun having to wipe off the stuff on each can. What the hell Amazon??
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Red bull orange
customer_reviews.text: Its red bull.. caught it for a great deal at the moment. Will purchase again if I find it for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: R. Finch

customer_reviews.title: Dented cans, torn box
customer_reviews.text: Every time I order these, the package box is completely torn apart or taped together. The cans are dented. Some of the cans are flat.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Torres

customer_reviews.title: It is red bull
customer_reviews.text: It's red bull. No surprises here. I prefer the sugar free though.
customer_reviews.author: ZJE

customer_reviews.title: Great price wish they offered more flavors
customer_reviews.text: While I love this flavor and the price was good. I wish they would stock more flavors with similar pricing not almost double for other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Late arrival so if your expecting it on time dont
customer_reviews.text: Arrived late I'm mad about it but the product as always is my favorite
customer_reviews.author: knessa Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love Red Bull... drink it on the weekends.. Use to drink it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Sarita McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Best idea ever
customer_reviews.text: I drink a Red Bull every morning. At the gas station I pay almost four dollars a can, I paid less the three dollars a can ordering them this way.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Grad students everywhere rejoice
customer_reviews.text: If you live in a cold climate like me, just put the whole box outside on the porch. Then your roommates will think you are just super dedicated and hard-working and not relying on the power of wiiings.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the product. Hard to find cases of this size elsewhere. Definitely will be purchasing again
customer_reviews.author: Sara Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Never tried before but I love the taste. Much better than most flavors, do wish it was offered in sugar free.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: The price is outrageous and I will not be purchasing it anymore!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Like the product but it is so overpriced I will no longer purchase it!!!!!!!!!’
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Rosenbach

customer_reviews.title: More please
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Got it for $16 on sale. I wish that deal came back I would definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nava

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I like Red Bull but it doesn't taste very good and it is expensive you can buy way better energy drinks for half the cost and double the size so don't wast your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Schrute

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love Red Bull so much. This is great to have it delivered at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: sometimes it’s like 70 dollars for a case so it’s not consistent ...
customer_reviews.text: The price is different every time I purchase it, sometimes it’s like 70 dollars for a case so it’s not consistent which sucks cuz I would put on auto order but not with those prices
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Just red bull but it was good
customer_reviews.text: 1st time getting food off here but it was good
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: It's on auto-delivety, love never running out!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I need my wings to get through the day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Product is great. Packaging a bit damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I love redbull so I have a subscription to get it every 4 weeks and for some reason my most recent shipment came with the outer packaging almost opened and the inner box for the redbull itself was ripped open and the cans were all severely dented. Very sad about this abuse to my redbull :(
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Cicale

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: Best price I’ve found. I no longer buy single red bulls.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: This was the cheapest place I could find to buy red bulls in bulk so I stocked up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Milbradt

customer_reviews.title: On time and in good conditions
customer_reviews.text: Item good !!! No damage at all ... And I'm happy for that.
customer_reviews.author: Ady

customer_reviews.title: My fave flavor
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting Red Bull I’ve tried. Makes a great mixer
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Boooooooo! Missin you!
customer_reviews.text: At the time I was purchasing this product the price was good. Dang right great price but now I am having to get the 8.4 oz case since the price is better! Taste is never disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Unholyanimation

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and half empty cans.
customer_reviews.text: 3 of the cans damaged had small holes in the side of the cans and they were half empty. The packing box was not damaged and the cans was were in the middle of the package had to be packed like this.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Good deal & as expected. Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Got an amazing deal on these! Arrived fairly fast for the size of the item. Tastes as expected! Perfect for redbull lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas K.

customer_reviews.title: I only ordered one pack and got two or a ...
customer_reviews.text: I only ordered one pack and got two or a total of 24 red bulls. Would give it a 10/5, if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste, the energy is smooth, thinking about repurchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAIR!
customer_reviews.text: The redbull box was busted open and a few cans were dented but still drinkable just a little flat tasting like it was dropped a couple times!
customer_reviews.author: sÿsterwick

product_meta.title: Red Bull Energy Drink 8.4 Fl Oz, 12 Pack
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Original| Size:8.4 Fl Oz (Pack of 12)

RED BULL GIVES YOU WINGS 
In 1987, Red Bull not only launched a completely new product, it created a whole new product category — energy drinks. From day one, Red Bull has been giving wings to people and ideas, setting many milestones in sports and culture.

When To Drink
Red Bull is appreciated worldwide by a variety of people such as top athletes, busy professionals, college students and travelers on long journeys.
For those who wish to have Red Bull’s benefits without sugars: The sugar free variant Red Bull Sugarfree provides the wings of Red Bull Energy Drinks without sugars.
Red Bull was the first global energy drink brand to address the consumer need for sugar free energy drinks and launched its Red Bull sugar free variants.

What's Inside The Can
Caffeine: Caffeine has already been known for its stimulating effects on the human body by ancient civilizations who consumed it from natural sources like tea, coffee, cacao beans & cola nuts.
Taurine: Taurine is an amino acid, naturally occurring in the human body and present in the daily diet. It is involved in a wide range of biological processes.
B group vitamins: Vitamins are essential micronutrients that are required for maintaining normal body functions. B group vitamins play an important role in energy metabolism, such as the build up and breakdown of carbohydrates and protein.
Sugars: Sugars are well known carbohydrates and can be found in many foodstuffs from fruits and fruit juices to other beverages including energy drinks.

12 Red Bull Energy Drink

You add to your basket a 12 pack of Red Bull Energy Drink, 8.4 Fl Oz per can.

Sustainability
Red Bull is very aware of its environmental responsibility and is constantly striving for improvement. Red Bull has made a conscious decision to use 100 percent recyclable aluminum cans, and we developed our Red Bull Coolers which use up to 45 percent less energy than conventional fridges.
feature_bullets: Red Bull Energy Drink Wings when you need them
Red Bull Energy Drinks formula contains high quality ingredients: Caffeine, Taurine, B group Vitamins, Sugars, Alpine water
Case of twelve (12 pack) 8.4 fluid ounce Red Bull Energy Drink cans
Red Bull cans are made of 100 percent recyclable aluminum
